definition: dwelling on the past/difficulty in adapting to changes

sentences.english: When you see your old flame, meet or forget?
sentences.chinese: 当你遇见旧情人，相见还是相忘？

sentences.english: Old love and old fires easily rekindles.
sentences.chinese: 旧情与未燃尽的火一样都容易重新点燃。

sentences.english: I want to get back with her. But I'm not going to grovel.
sentences.chinese: 我想和她重温旧情，但我不会低三下四求她的。

sentences.english: Is it really a good idea to 'friend' our old flames and crushes online?
sentences.chinese: 在网上将旧情人加为好友，这样做合适吗？

sentences.english: Have you ever seen your old flame?
sentences.chinese: 你还见过你的旧情人吗？

sentences.english: He and my father had been college friends and were trying, perhaps, to take up again their old friendship.
sentences.chinese: 道登和我父亲是大学同学，俩人也许是想再续旧情吧。

sentences.english: When you meet your old flame, meet or forget?
sentences.chinese: 当你遇见旧情人，相见还是相忘？

sentences.english: When you see your old flame OR ex-BF/GF, meet or forget?
sentences.chinese: 当你遇见旧情人，相见还是相忘？

sentences.english: My thoughts were turned into the channel of their earlier bent.
sentences.chinese: 于是我旧情复萌，思想又转上原来的轨道。

sentences.english: The old love and the new love.
He is still carrying the torch for his old sweetheart.
sentences.chinese: 他仍然对他的旧情人恋恋不忘。

sentences.english: Did you go to see your old flame behind my back yesterday?
sentences.chinese: 你昨晚背着我去跟你的旧情人约会了吗？

sentences.english: Bulter paid all the affection to their daughter, but Scarlett still loved Ashley.
sentences.chinese: 可是，郝思嘉对阿希礼仍然旧情不忘。

sentences.english: Like an old lover they forgive, but they will never forget.
sentences.chinese: 他们就像旧情人一样会原谅你，但永远不会忘记。

sentences.english: In that way , your previous boyfriend will think he won't lose face, miss his past lover, and very capable.
sentences.chinese: 那样只能使男人觉得自己很有面子很念旧情很有办法。

sentences.english: Have you ever seen your old fame?
sentences.chinese: 你还见过你的旧情人吗？

definition: to remember old friends/to cherish old friendships/for old time's sake
lit. lotus roots may break, but the fiber remains joined (idiom); lovers part, but still long for one another
to make friends again/to renew old cordial relations
to raise the same old topic again/to hark back
to revive old dreams (idiom); to relive past experiences
